name: More Than Just Chess
description:
Experience a whole new kind of chess!
More Than Just Chess offers you the famous and proven board game classic improved upon by modern elements and mechanics, which reveals a unique playing experience.
With its new elements, More Than Just Chess offers you and your friends the opportunity to play hours of complex strategical competition against each other..Key features:
  • Mana system to execute actions
  • Special fields for extra mana
  • Summonable pieces
  • Upgrades to enhance your pieces
  • Level system for attack and defense of each piece
